meanings.definition: The skin of a seal, used for making clothing or other items.
meanings.sent1: The Inuit people crafted warm mittens from sealskins.
meanings.sent2: She wore a luxurious coat made of sealskins to stay cozy in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a trendy purse out of colorful sealskins.
meanings.sent4: The history museum displayed an ancient cloak made of sealskins.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh sealskins filled the workshop as the tailor worked on a new jacket.

meanings.sent1: The traditional parka was lined with soft sealskins for extra warmth.
meanings.sent2: The exhibit showcased a variety of elegant sealskins garments.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured a quirky outfit made entirely of sealskins.
meanings.sent4: The explorer's boots were as tough as sealskins on his daring journey.
meanings.sent5: The sealskins dress shimmered under the stage lights, captivating the audience.
